comments:
I20050222-0821

NPE when typing characters in Incremental Find

Have this x/X.java:
---snip---
/***********************************************************************
 * Copyleft
 ***********************************************************************/
package x;

public class X {}
---snap---

- open the file -> the header comment is collapsed and the caret is at position
2 : 1
- press Ctrl+J and start typing

*** Bug 86247 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

fixed - ProjectionViewer adapts the selection when it starts or ends at an
offset wher a folded region starts and ends (which really represents two
different model offsets). If the selection is at a the beginning of a line, we
include the folded region into the selection.

However, we should not do this if the widget selection has no length - in that
case, simply leave it where it is.

fixed > 20050225
